doc:
Linda Regan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linda_Regan 0 Linda Regan (born 1949) is a British author and actress, who has appeared in television and film. She is best known for her role as Yellowcoat April in the British holiday camp sitcom Hi-de-Hi!. She is married to the actor Brian Murphy. Linda_Regan ( born 1949 ) is a_British_author_and_actress , who has_appeared in television_and_film . She is_best_known for her_role as Yellowcoat_April in the_British_holiday_camp_sitcom_Hi-de-Hi ! . She is_married to the_actor_Brian_Murphy .
